presentation.subtitle: Hello, welcome to my portfolio! Let me show you what I have made so far....

card.intro: My name is Lorenzo Catalano. I have a passion for technology and programming and recently graduated from UCLL, where I studied applied computer science.
card.body: My main focus is on full stack web development, but working on embedded systems is not a problem for me. 'MERN' is currently my go-to stack for web development (more skills on my resume).
